subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick was upset by Tomas Berdych, 6-7 (3), 7-5, 7-6 (3), in the semifinals of the Japan Open in Tokyo. The ninth-seeded Berdych will face the fifth-seeded Juan Martín del Potro of Argentina in Sunday’s final. Del Potro defeated No. 4 Richard Gasquet, 6-3, 4-6, 7-5.
